urgent.action: Set up 301 redirect from http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en to https://konacoffeedonut.com/en. This duplicate URL has 118 impressions at position #12 with 0 clicks, splitting authority with your main domain.
urgent.reasoning: 118 impressions is your highest-impression page but gets zero clicks. Link equity is split between www and non-www versions, hurting rankings for both.

urgent.action: Audit and improve mobile experience immediately. Mobile is only 35% of traffic for a local food business in Waikiki — should be 60-70%. Check page speed, tap targets, and mobile usability in GSC.
urgent.reasoning: Tourists searching 'near me' queries are almost exclusively on mobile. Your desktop-heavy skew suggests mobile UX issues suppressing mobile rankings.

urgent.action: Create and fully optimize Google Business Profile now with 'opening soon' status, set opening date to Feb 25, 2026. Add photos, hours, menu, and Waikiki address.
urgent.reasoning: Opening in 13 days. GBP is critical for all 'near me' queries. Without it, you cannot appear in the local map pack.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me' and 'best donuts in Waikiki' to homepage H1/H2 and meta description. Add structured data (LocalBusiness schema) with exact Waikiki address.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #9 with 18 impressions — moving to top 5 is achievable with on-page optimization. High-intent local query.

quickWins.action: Rewrite meta title and description for /en/about-kona-coffee to be more click-worthy. Current 1.8% CTR at position #6.8 is very low. Use compelling copy like 'What Makes Kona Coffee Special | Taste It in Waikiki'.
quickWins.reasoning: 56 impressions but only 1 click. Better meta tags alone could 3-5x clicks without changing rankings.

quickWins.action: Improve meta title/description for /en/menu. Add rich snippets or menu structured data. Current 2% CTR at position #1.7 is extremely low for a top-2 ranking.
quickWins.reasoning: 49 impressions at position #1.7 but only 1 click means your SERP snippet is not compelling. Easy fix with better meta tags.

quickWins.action: Create a dedicated landing page or section targeting 'donut shops in Waikiki' / 'donut shops near me' with location-specific content, photos, and opening hours.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #6 with impressions showing — a targeted page could push into top 3 for multiple 'donut shop' variants.

opportunities.action: Create /ja/ Japanese language pages targeting Japanese tourists in Waikiki. Japan is 5% of traffic and Japanese tourists are a massive Waikiki demographic. Target keywords like 'ワイキキ ドーナツ' and 'コナコーヒー'.
opportunities.reasoning: Japan is already 5% of your geo without any Japanese content. Waikiki has huge Japanese tourist traffic. Localized content could capture significant search volume.

opportunities.action: Expand Korean content beyond about-kona-coffee. Create Korean menu page, location page, and blog posts about Kona coffee. Already ranking #4.8 for Korean keywords.
opportunities.reasoning: Korean content already performing well at position #4.8. Korea is 6% of traffic. Korean tourists are a key Waikiki demographic.

opportunities.action: Create blog content targeting 'best coffee in Waikiki', 'Waikiki breakfast spots', 'where to get donuts in Waikiki'. Build local authority before grand opening.
opportunities.reasoning: Local content hub establishes topical authority and captures long-tail Waikiki-related searches.

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' dominates with 12 clicks, 28.6% CTR at position #1. Strong brand recognition building.
insights.suggestion: Continue brand-building through social media and local PR. Protect and expand brand keyword variations.

insights.observation: Desktop (62%) dominates over Mobile (35%) — unusual for a local food business in a tourist area.
insights.suggestion: Investigate mobile UX issues. Run mobile usability audit. Tourists search on phones.

insights.observation: Korea (6%) and Japan (5%) already showing interest with minimal localized content.
insights.suggestion: Prioritize Japanese and Korean content for Waikiki's international tourist demographic.

insights.observation: 13 days until grand opening (Feb 25, 2026). Pre-launch SEO window closing.
insights.suggestion: Focus remaining time on GBP optimization, meta tag improvements, and mobile fixes. Save content creation for post-launch.
